Package actions

Interface Action

All Known Implementing Classes:
Forward, RotateLeft, RotateRight
public interface Action
Specifies how actions should be built so that every information can be accessible

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Optional<Action>
    fromToken(String token)
     
    void
    process(Adventurer adventurer, TreasureMap treasureMap, List<Adventurer> adventurers)
     

  • Method Details

    • fromToken

      static Optional<Action> fromToken(String token)
      Parameters:
      token - Letter used in the input file to identify the action
      Returns:
      The action wrapped in an optional if the token matches an action, or an empty optional otherwise

    • process

      void process(Adventurer adventurer, TreasureMap treasureMap, List<Adventurer> adventurers)
      Parameters:
      adventurer - The adventurer that makes the action
      treasureMap - The map on which the action takes place
      adventurers - All the users on the map
